nodes.diff: We need to track authorship of edits.
We need to track the authorship of issue body edits so we can properly reward contributors.
We need to track the authorship of issue body edits so we can properly reward contributors who help improve the quality of issue descriptions.

We need to track the authorship of issue body edits so we can properly reward contributors who help improve the quality of issue descriptions.

This implementation should:
1. Track all edits to the issue body
2. Calculate percentage of contribution by each editor
3. Distribute rewards accordingly

We need to track the authorship of issue body edits so we can properly reward contributors who help improve the quality of issue descriptions.

This implementation should:
1. Track all edits to the issue body
2. Calculate percentage of contribution by each editor
3. Distribute rewards accordingly
4. Generate a visual report showing contribution percentages

Additional requirements:
- Handle formatting changes properly
- Track character-level changes
- Support multiple editors
